item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, January 3, 2025 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Can LLMs write better code if you keep asking them to "write better code"? (190 points | 104 comments)
2. UK ICO response to Google's policy change on device fingerprinting (141 points | 86 comments)
3. Court strikes down US net neutrality rules (123 points | 89 comments)
4. Gource: Software Version Control Visualization (57 points | 26 comments)
5. BlogScroll – An open directory of personal sites and blogs (251 points | 70 comments)
6. Apple auto-opts everyone into having their photos analyzed by AI for landmarks (52 points | 13 comments)
7. Zildjian, a 400-year-old cymbal-making company in Massachusetts (395 points | 176 comments)
8. iTerm2 critical security release (630 points | 388 comments)
9. If I Could Wave a Magic Wand (28 points | 6 comments)
10. CoinTracker (YC W18) hiring product engineer to solve crypto accounting ( | hide)
11. Laser mapping reveals oldest Amazonian cities, built 2500 years ago (2024) (53 points | 16 comments)
12. Advent of Code 2024 in pure SQL (379 points | 86 comments)
13. Kuvasz-streamer: open-source CDC for Postgres for low latency replication (79 points | 18 comments)
14. JPL Horizons on-line solar system data and ephemeris computation service (56 points | 7 comments)
15. Ask HN: How to learn marketing and sales as a solo entrepreneur? (256 points | 76 comments)
16. A Puzzle about a Calculator (5 points | discuss)
17. Optimizing Ruby's JSON, Part 4 (161 points | 19 comments)
18. Ergo S-1 – An open-source ergonomic wireless keyboard (20 points | 10 comments)
19. DOOM CAPTCHA (1240 points | 264 comments)
20. Shmøergh Hog – The making of a simple analog synth (140 points | 4 comments)
21. TinyStories: How Small Can Language Models Be and Still Speak Coherent English? (2023) (183 points | 83 comments)
22. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (January 2025) (273 points | 232 comments)
23. "A Digital Prison": Surveillance and the suppression of civil society in Serbia (59 points | 38 comments)
24. XiangShan – Open-source high performance RISC-V processor (232 points | 75 comments)
25. Benchmarking RSA Key Generation (9 points | discuss)
26. The Alder Lake SHLX Anomaly (159 points | 50 comments)
27. Rules for writing software tutorials (246 points | 53 comments)
28. Diagnosing an Unusual WiFi Issue (2020) (226 points | 76 comments)
29. Postgres UUIDv7 and per-back end monotonicity (209 points | 95 comments)
30. uBlock Origin GPL code being stolen by team behind honey browser extension (853 points | 362 comments)
